text: Carla Cassola (15 December 1947 – 24 July 2022) was an Italian actress and composer. She was born in Taormina, Italy. She was known for dubbing Tilda Swinton in Orlando. Cassola was also in the 1990 movie Captain America. Cassola died on 24 July 2022 in Welwyn Garden City, England at the age of 74.E’ deceduta Carla Cassola, compagna dell’attore Andrea Tidona ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:20th- century Italian composers Category:21st-century Italian composers
title: Carla Cassola
